targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        EXTRACT(year FROM creation_timestamp::timestamp) AS year,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_project
GROUP BY year
ORDER BY year ASC

SELECT
        status,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_project
GROUP BY status
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_project;

SELECT
        EXTRACT(year FROM creation_timestamp::timestamp) AS year,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_shoot
GROUP BY year
ORDER BY year ASC

SELECT
        status,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_shoot
GROUP BY status
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_shoot;

SELECT
        s.cloud_profile AS cloud_profile,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_shoot AS s
GROUP BY s.cloud_profile

SELECT
        kubernetes_version,
        COUNT(id)
FROM g_seed
GROUP BY kubernetes_version
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_seed;

SELECT
        seed_name AS seed,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_shoot
GROUP BY seed

SELECT
        k8s_version,
        COUNT(id)
FROM g_shoot
GROUP BY k8s_version

SELECT
        cloud_profile,
        region,
        COUNT(id)
FROM g_shoot
GROUP BY cloud_profile, region;

panels.title: Shoots Grouped by Cloud Profile & Region

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        s.project_name AS project,
        p.owner AS owner,
        COUNT(s.id) AS Total
FROM g_shoot AS s
INNER JOIN g_project AS p ON s.project_name = p.name
GROUP BY s.project_name, p.owner
ORDER BY total DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
        status,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_machine
GROUP BY status
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_machine;

SELECT
        namespace,
        COUNT(id) as total
FROM g_machine
GROUP BY namespace

SELECT
        provider_type,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_backup_bucket
GROUP BY provider_type

SELECT
        provider_type,
        region_name,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_backup_bucket
GROUP BY (provider_type, region_name)

SELECT
        state,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_backup_bucket
GROUP BY (state);
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_backup_bucket;
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_bastion;

SELECT
        seed_name AS seed,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM g_bastion
GROUP BY seed

panels.description: Number of DNSRecord objects in seeds.

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_dns_record;

panels.title: Number of DNS Records

panels.description: Number of DNSEntry objects in both garden and seeds.

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM g_dns_entry;

panels.title: Number of DNS Entries
